TopicTitle: Game runs so slow that Windows thinks it locked up

Articles.Content:
When giving normal actions to a large vehicle during launch Windows will pop up a dialog asking whether the user wants to wait for the program to respond.  At no time should the game strain system resources in a way that causes Windows to detect that it is malfunctioning.  Go back to the drawing board on this.

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
